name: Robotic Rewind
description:
This is a game for the Brackeys 2020 .2 Gamejam with the theme of "Rewind"

You play as a small robot, that can only run for 15 seconds, and you must collect rewind keys to rewind it, allowing it to travel further. Its a small yet fun game to play, and comes with 5 levels and customisation (hats).

This was my first game jam so I really hope it all works well.
